mapper.select: select board.board_no, board.board_title, board.board_category, board.board_content, member.member_nickname as board_writer_nickname, member_profile.attachment_no as board_writer_profile_url, board.board_wtime as board_write_time, board.board_reply from board left outer join member on board.board_writer = member.member_no left outer join member_profile on member.member_no = member_profile.member_no order by board.board_no desc

select board.board_no, board.board_title, board.board_category, board.board_content, member.member_nickname as board_writer_nickname, member_profile.attachment_no as board_writer_profile_url, board.board_wtime as board_write_time, board.board_reply from board left outer join member on board.board_writer = member.member_no left outer join member_profile on member.member_no = member_profile.member_no where board.board_category = #{category} order by board.board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board ( board_no, board_group_no, board_title, board_category, board_writer, board_write_time, board_content, board_reply ) values ( board_seq.nextval, #{boardGroupNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardWriter}, systimestamp, #{boardContent}, 0 )
